review_text: Beautiful classical buildings, interior and nature, free parking, peaceful walk around the park and along side the Vecht
Very nice for walk through the woods and along the river Vecht .  Inside garden in the former Monastery is fabulous!  They serve nature foods except the apple pie.
Beautiful building and setting. Easy parking!

I had a Christmas lunch here with about 30 other people on the 9th of December.
Firstly, I would like to state that the quality and freshness of the food offered was impeccable. But sadly, quite lame in what was offered.
The staff were friendly and helpful.
Current exhibit is robots in captivity. Do go and visit
Nice place for a quick coffee and in the weekend a super place to go for a walk in their park, so beautiful. We still have plans to go there for dinner soon!
To be honest. I went there for a (Christian) retreat in 'de Spil', and 'de Spil' will move end of year. Really really enjoyed the retreat and the lovely, peaceful surroundings
Imaginative food, enthusiastic staff, interesting venue. Emphasis on local ingredients, herbs and fermentation.
